scripts.tauri:dev:sck: bash -lc 'SWIFT_LIB_DIR=""; if [ ! -d /usr/lib/swift ]; then if [ -d /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/swift-5.5/macosx ]; then SWIFT_LIB_DIR=/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/swift-5.5/macosx; elif [ -d /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/swift/macosx ]; then SWIFT_LIB_DIR=/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/swift/macosx; elif [ -d /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/lib/swift-5.5/macosx ]; then SWIFT_LIB_DIR=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/lib/swift-5.5/macosx; elif [ -d /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/lib/swift/macosx ]; then SWIFT_LIB_DIR=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/lib/swift/macosx; fi; if [ -n "$SWIFT_LIB_DIR" ]; then export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$SWIFT_LIB_DIR:$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH"; fi; fi; RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN=stable tauri dev --features screencapturekit'
